Package view

Class ViewHandler

java.lang.Object
view.ViewCreator
view.ViewHandler
public class ViewHandler
extends ViewCreator
The class is used to set or initialize different views and controllers.
Version:
1.0.0 2021
Author:
Group8-SEP2

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ViewHandler​(ViewModelFactory viewModelFactory)
    One-argument constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void close()
    This method closes the views and interrupts the scene.
    protected void initViewController​(ViewController controller, javafx.scene.layout.Region root)
    This method is used to initialize the a ViewController with the Root object.
    void openView​(java.lang.String id)
    The method is used to change the current view and system and to display a new one using an ID to identify the correct view.
    void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
    First method that is executed when the system is ran, it determines the first view in the system.

    getViewController, loadFromFXML

    • ViewHandler

      public ViewHandler​(ViewModelFactory viewModelFactory)
      One-argument constructor.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      First method that is executed when the system is ran, it determines the first view in the system.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - Stage object for the stage to be set.

    • openView

      public void openView​(java.lang.String id)
      The method is used to change the current view and system and to display a new one using an ID to identify the correct view.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the view that has to be set.

    • close

      public void close()
      This method closes the views and interrupts the scene.

    • initViewController

      This method is used to initialize the a ViewController with the Root object.
      Specified by:
      initViewController in class ViewCreator
      Parameters:
      controller - ViewController object
      root - Root object
